short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search music straight from your address bar! Just type in M, then press TAB and type an artist or song.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search4Musix Chrome browser extension by Aztec, configures your Default Search in Chrome browser to provide these features.
Set your default search provider to blpsearch.com
Search for music by going to the address bar and then typing 'M' and pressing the TAB key on your keyboard, enter your query and get the results you are looking for ( artist, song or an album).
Please read carefully: By clicking the “ADD TO CHROME” button in the top right hand corner and installing the Search4Musix Chrome browser extension, you agree to install this extension, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. 
You can uninstall the extension at any time from the chrome extensions page or from the extensions bar on the top right of your browser

Terms:
https://www.blpsearch.com/terms
Privacy Policy:
https://www.blpsearch.com/privacy
